marketing_package.reel_caption: Corporate language is a different vibe altogether. Matlab kuch aur hi hota hai bhai! Watch till the end for the ultimate scam.

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, looking directly into the camera with a fake smile in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: Kya aapko lagta hai ki aapka boss sach bol raha hai? Arre bhai corporate language ka asli matlab samjho na sir!
scenes.caption: Corporate language ka ASLI matlab

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, pointing to a floating text bubble that says WE ARE A FAMILY in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: Jab boss bole We Are A Family, toh uska matlab hai... Beta, ab tujhse overtime ke paise nahi milenge.
scenes.caption: We Are A Family = OVERTIME

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, looking confused at his laptop screen in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: Aur jab mail aaye As Discussed, toh samajh lo scene tight hai. Iska matlab hai ki maine pehle bola tha aur tune dhyan nahi diya!
scenes.caption: As Discussed = SCENE TIGHT

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, rubbing his temples in frustration in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: Let us take this offline ka matlab hai... Dimag kharab mat kar, akele mein teri class leta hoon!
scenes.caption: Take This Offline = CLASS LENA

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, holding a coffee mug that says BEST BOSS while looking dead inside in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: Quick Check-in matlab... Kasam se, tu kaam kar raha hai ya bas baitha hai?
scenes.caption: Quick Check-in = MONITORING

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, looking at a calendar filled with red marks in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: High Visibility project matlab... Weekend gaya tel lene, ab gulu-gulu bhul jao!
scenes.caption: High Visibility = NO WEEKEND

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, lying face down on his desk in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: Aur sabse bada scam... You have Great Potential. Matlab, kaam double hoga par appraisal zero!
scenes.caption: Great Potential = ZERO APPRAISAL

scenes.visual_prompt: 3D render, Pixar-style, cinematic lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio, Indian Sameer, a 30-year-old product manager with thick-rimmed glasses and a receding hairline wearing a light blue formal shirt, slowly fading away as his laptop glows bright red in a modern Indian tech park office.
scenes.hindi_speech: Corporate life mein logic mat dhoondho bhai, bas resignation draft karke rakho!
scenes.caption: Resignation hi EKMAATRA hal hai
